resources.string: to use Google Payment API to setup we have to add dependencies for it ,, then modify manifest \n to use it whe have to Create PaymentsClient instance then Implement the isReadyToPay method and Create PaymentDataRequest object \n then Create OnClickListener object then Handle the PaymentData response object
here is home where we may put notifications and other things
